adminGuide.title: Admin Gayd
adminGuide.description: Komplit gayd fɔ pletfɔm administreta dɛn. Lan aw fɔ manej di wan dɛn we de yuz am, wach aw fɔ analays, ɛn aw fɔ kɔnfigyut di sistɛm sɛtin dɛn.

enterpriseGuide.title: Entapraiz Gayd
enterpriseGuide.description: Gayd fɔ di kɔmni administreta dɛn. Lan fɔ manej yu tim, sɛt ap no bɔt, ɛn handle kɔntinyu aprɔval.
enterpriseGuide.feature3: Di Wokflɔ dɛn fɔ Aprɔval Kɔntinɛnt

userGuide.title: Yuz Gɛd
userGuide.description: Ɔl wetin yu nid fɔ mek, analayz, ɛn pablish kɔntinyu. Pafɛkt fɔ kɔntinyu krieta ɛn makɛt.

overview.intro: As pletfɔm administreta, yu gɛt akses to kɔmprɛhɛnsif tul dɛn fɔ monitar ɛn manej di ɔl Kɔntinɛnt pletfɔm. Dis gayd go ɛp yu fɔ ɔndastand yu administretiv kapabiliti.
overview.dashboardDesc: Di Admin Dashboard de gi yu bɔd in yay fɔ si di pletfɔm aktiviti ɛn wɛlbɔdi.
overview.feature4: Kwik akses to impɔtant administretiv wok dɛn
overview.tip: Visit di Admin Dashboard ɔltɛm fɔ no bɔt di tin dɛn we de apin na di pletfɔm ɛn fɔ no di prɔblɛm dɛn we kin apin kwik kwik wan.

userManagement.intro: Yuza manejmɛnt na wan kɔr administretiv wok we de alaw yu fɔ ɔvasayz ɔl di yuza ɛn ɛntapraiz dɛn na di pletfɔm.
userManagement.viewUsersTitle: Fɔ Si ɛn Manej di Yuzman dɛn
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Akses di Yuz Manejmɛnt sɛkshɔn fɔ si, fɛn, ɛn manej ɔl di wan dɛn we de yuz di pletfɔm.
userManagement.feature1: Sɔch ɛn filta di wan dɛn we de yuz am bay dɛn nem, imel, ɔ di wok we dɛn de du
userManagement.feature2: Luk di ditel yuz profayl ɛn aktiviti istri
userManagement.feature4: Deaktiv ɔ dilit yuz akɔn dɛn we nid de
userManagement.rolesTitle: Ɔndastand di wok we di pɔsin we de yuz am fɔ du
userManagement.rolesDesc: Kɔntinyu gɛt tri praymar yuza rol dɛn:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Ful pletfɔm akses wit sistem kɔnfigyushɔn kapabiliti
userManagement.role2: Enterprise Admin: I de manej dɛn kɔmni in tim ɛn di sɛtin dɛn
userManagement.role3: Yuza: Standart kɔntinyu krieshɔn ɛn analisis ficha dɛn
userManagement.warning: Ɔltɛm verify di impak bifo yu chenj yuz rol ɔ dilit akɔn. Dɛn akshɔn ya kin afɛkt di tim wokflɔ.

analytics.intro: Analitiks de gi dip insayt fɔ aw dɛn de yuz di pletfɔm akɔdin to ɔl di ɛntapraiz ɛn yuza dɛn.
analytics.metric1: Total aktif yuza ɛn growth tren
analytics.metric5: Kɔmplians ɛn risk skɔ akɔdin to ɛntapraiz
analytics.tip: Ɛkspɔt analitiks ripɔt fɔ stekholda prɛzɛntɛnshɔn yuz di Daunlod Ripɔt ficha.

financials.intro: Di Faynanshɛl Ɔvaviu sɛkshɔn de gi visibiliti insay di pletfɔm rɛvɛnyu ɛn sabskripshɔn mɛtrik.
financials.revenueDesc: Monitor di faynɛns wɛlbɔdi ɛn sabskripshɔn tren akɔdin to ɔl di ɛntapraiz dɛn.
financials.feature3: Yuz di kredit ɛn istri bɔt di tin dɛn we yu bay

systemConfig.intro: Sistem kɔnfigyushɔn de alaw yu fɔ manej di pletfɔm-wayd sɛtin ɛn intagreshɔn dɛn.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Kɔnfigyut ɛn monitar tɔd-pati intagreshɔn dɛn:
systemConfig.integration1: Ayrshare API fɔ soshal midia pɔblishing
systemConfig.integration2: AI savis fɔ kɔntinyu fɔ jɛnɛreshɔn ɛn analisis
systemConfig.tip: Ɔltɛm tɛst intagreshɔn dɛn na stej ɛnvayrɔmɛnt bifo yu mek chenj to prodakshɔn sɛtin.

gettingStarted.intro: Welkam to Kɔntinɛnt! As Ɛntaprayz Administreta, yu gɛt di tul dɛn fɔ manej yu tim, fɔ mek di kɔntinyu gaydlayn dɛn, ɛn mek shɔ se di brand kɔnsistɛns.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Fɔ fala dɛn step ya fɔ sɛt yu ɛntapraiz akɔn:
gettingStarted.step1: Navigate to Settings > Enterprise fɔ akses yu kɔmni dɛshbɔd
gettingStarted.step2: Uplod yu kɔmni in brand gaydlayn ɛn polisi dɛn na di Knowledge Base
gettingStarted.step3: Invayt yu tim mɛmba dɛn ɛn gi dɛn di rayt wok
gettingStarted.step4: Kɔnfigyut aprɔval wokflɔ fɔ kɔntinyu fɔ rivyu
gettingStarted.tip: Kɔmplit yu Knowledge Base setup bifo yu invayt tim mɛmba dɛn fɔ mek shɔ se dɛn gɛt akses to brand gaydlayn frɔm di fɔs de.

teamManagement.intro: If di tim manejmɛnt de mek shɔ se dɛn wok togɛda fayn fayn wan ɛn di rayt akses kɔntrol insay yu ɔganayzeshɔn.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Ad nyu mɛmba dɛn to yu ɛntapraiz tim:
teamManagement.feature1: Ɛntay di tim mɛmba in imel adrɛs
teamManagement.feature2: Pik dɛn wok (Krieta, Maneja, ɔ Admin) .
teamManagement.feature3: Ad wan yu yon mɛsej we yu kin pik to di inviteshɔn
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Gi di wok dɛn we yu fɔ du bay di wok we yu fɔ du:
teamManagement.role1: Krieta: I kin mek ɛn sɛn kɔntinyu fɔ mek dɛn gri fɔ am
teamManagement.role2: Maneja: I kin apruv/rijɛkt kɔntinyu ɛn manej di wan dɛn we mek am
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Ful ɛntapraiz akses inklud bil ɛn sɛtin
teamManagement.tip: Inviteshɔn dɛn kin dɔn afta 7 dez. Mɛmba di tim mɛmba dɛn fɔ tek dɛn inviteshɔn kwik kwik wan.

knowledgeBase.intro: Di Knowledge Base na yu kɔmni in sɛntral ripɔsitɔri fɔ brand gaydlayn, polisi, ɛn kɔntinyu lɔ dɛn. Di dɔkyumɛnt dɛn we dɛn dɔn ɔplod ya de tɛl di tin dɛn we AI dɔn mek fɔ ɔl di tim mɛmba dɛn.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Ad dɔkyumɛnt dɛn we go gayd fɔ mek kɔntinyu:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Brand stayl gayd ɛn vɔys gaydlayn
knowledgeBase.docType4: Rigyuleshɔn dɛn we gɛt fɔ du wit di industri
knowledgeBase.tip: Uplod yu most impotant brand guidelines fos. Di AI de prayoritayz di dɔkyumɛnt dɛn na di kɔmni Knowledge Base pas wan wan yuza ɔplod dɛn.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Di aprɔval wokflɔ de mek shɔ se ɔl di tin dɛn we de insay de mit yu kɔmni in standad bifo dɛn pablish.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Di tin dɛn we de insay de flɔ tru dɛn stej ya:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Krieta de jenarayz ɔ analayz di tin dɛn we de insay
approvalWorkflow.step2: Dɛn kin sɛn di tin dɛn we de insay fɔ mek dɛn gri fɔ am (if dɛn nid am) .
approvalWorkflow.step3: Maneja de rivyu ɛn gi fidbak
approvalWorkflow.step4: Dɛn kin pablish di tin dɛn we dɛn dɔn gri fɔ na soshal pletfɔm dɛn
approvalWorkflow.warning: Enable aprɔval rikwaymɛnt dɛn na Sɛtin fɔ mek shɔ se dɛn rivyu ɔl di tin dɛn we de insay bifo dɛn pablish.

billing.intro: Manej yu ɛntapraiz sabskripshɔn ɛn monitar yu kredit yus.
billing.feature1: Di ditel dɛn bɔt di plan we de naw ɛn di we aw dɛn de sheb di kredit
billing.feature2: Yuz istri ɛn ɔda kredit dɛn we lɛf
billing.feature3: Invɔys istri ɛn di we aw dɛn de pe

adminUsersPage.title: Yuz Manejmɛnt
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Manej di wan dɛn we de yuz am ɔlsay na di pletfɔm

actions.impersonate: Mek lɛk se na so i bi

toasts.loadFailed: Failed fɔ lod di wan dɛn we de yuz am
toasts.deleteSuccess: Yuzman dɔn dilit fayn fayn wan
toasts.subscriptionCancelFailed: Mistek we yu kansel di sabskripshɔn

adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Yu shɔ se yu want fɔ dilit dis yuza?
adminUsersPage.deleteWarning: Dis akshɔn nɔ go ebul fɔ undone.

userDetails.title: Ditiɛl dɛn bɔt di pɔsin we de yuz am
userDetails.currentPeriodEnd: Di Pɛriɔd we De Naw Ɛnd

deleteModal.title: Dilit Yuzman
deleteModal.description: Dis go dilit di pɔsin we de yuz am ɛn ɔl di data we gɛt fɔ du wit am fɔ ɔltɛm:
deleteModal.allContent: Ɔl di tin dɛn we dɛn dɔn mek
deleteModal.irreversible: Dis akshɔn nɔ go ebul fɔ undone.

sections.analyzeContent: Analayz di tin dɛn we de insay

gettingStarted.intro: Welkam to Kɔntinɛnt! Dis gayd go ɛp yu fɔ mek kɔmplit, kɔmpliant kɔntinyu yuz AI-pawa tul dɛn.
gettingStarted.step1: Sɛt yu prɔfayl wit kɔrɛkt infɔmeshɔn
gettingStarted.step2: Kɔnekt yu soshal midia akɔn dɛn
gettingStarted.step3: Krio wan Stratejik Profail fɔ yu brand ɔ kampen
gettingStarted.step4: Jɛnɛret yu fɔs pat pan di tin dɛn we de insay
gettingStarted.tip: Start wit wan Stratejik Profayl fɔ mek shɔ se ɔl yu kɔntinyu fɔ kɔntinyu fɔ gɛt kɔnsistɛns tɔyn ɛn mɛsej.

contentCreation.intro: Contentry in AI-powered content generation de ɛp yu fɔ mek ɛngayjmɛnt post dɛn insay sɛkɔn.
contentCreation.feature1: Ɛntay wan tɔpik ɔ prɔmpt we de tɔk bɔt wetin yu want fɔ post bɔt
contentCreation.feature2: Pik yu target pletfɔm dɛn (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, ɛn ɔda wan dɛn)
contentCreation.feature3: Pik di tɔyn we yu lɛk fɔ rayt
contentCreation.feature4: If yu want fɔ mek wan pikchɔ we de wit yu
contentCreation.schedulingTitle: Di Tin dɛn we De Insay di Skedul
contentCreation.schedule1: Sɛt ap rikɔrɛkt kɔntinyu jɛnɛreshɔn schedule
contentCreation.schedule2: Pik patikyula de ɛn tɛm fɔ ɔtomɛtik post
contentCreation.schedule3: Enable auto-posting ɔ manual review bifo yu pablish
contentCreation.tip: Yuz di ‘Promotional Content’ chɛkbɔks we yu de mek makɛt post fɔ mek shɔ se di kɔmplians analisis tink bɔt di prɔmoshɔnal gaydlayn dɛn.

analyzeContent.intro: Di Analyze Content ficha de rivyu yu kɔntinyu fɔ si if yu de fala di lɔ, di kɔlchɔ sɛnsitiviti, ɛn di brand alaynɛshɔn.
analyzeContent.howToTitle: Aw fɔ Analayz Di Tin dɛn we De Insay
analyzeContent.step1: Navigate to Kɔntinɛnt Mɔdareshɔn > Analayz Kɔntinɛnt
analyzeContent.step2: Paste yu kɔntinyu na di tɛks eria
analyzeContent.step3: Pik wan Stratejik Profayl fɔ di kɔntɛks
analyzeContent.step4: Klik Analyze fɔ gɛt ditayli fidbak
analyzeContent.type1: Fɔ fala di kɔmni in polisi ɛn gaydlayn dɛn
analyzeContent.type2: Kɔlchɔral sɛnsitiviti akɔs difrɛn rijyɔn dɛn
analyzeContent.type4: Di prɔblɛm dɛn we kin apin ɛn di tin dɛn we dɛn kin tɔk bɔt
analyzeContent.tip: Ɔltɛm analayz kɔntinyu bifo yu pablish to ɛksternal pletfɔm, mɔ fɔ kampen dɛn we de tɔch bɔku rijyɔn dɛn.

strategicProfiles.intro: Stratejik Profayl dɛn de difayn di kɔntɛks, tɔyn, ɛn gaydlayn fɔ mek ɛn analisis kɔntinyu.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Difayn di profayl in target ɔdiɛns ɛn di rizin
strategicProfiles.feature2: Sɛt tin dɛn we yu fɔ tink bɔt na di kɔlchɔ ɛn rijinal
strategicProfiles.feature3: Uplod profayl-spɛsifi k dɔkyumɛnt ɛn gaydlayn dɛn
strategicProfiles.feature4: Kɔnfigyut difɔlt tɔyn ɛn stayl prɛferɛns dɛn
strategicProfiles.tip: Krio seperet Stratejik Profail fɔ difrɛn kampen, brand, ɔ rijinal makit.

socialAccounts.intro: Kɔnekt yu soshal midia akɔn fɔ pablish kɔntinyu dairekt frɔm Kɔntinɛnt.
socialAccounts.connectDesc: Di pletfɔm dɛn we dɛn de sɔpɔt na:
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Pɔsin ɛn Kɔmni pej dɛn
socialAccounts.warning: Kip yu soshal akɔn kɔnɛkshɔn dɛn ɔp to det. Token dɛn we dɔn dɔn kin mek di post dɛn we dɛn dɔn sɛtul nɔ go pablish.

approvalProcess.intro: If yu ɛntapraiz gɛt aprɔval wokflɔ dɛn we dɛn dɔn ɛnabul, dɛn fɔ rivyu di tin dɛn we de insay bifo dɛn pablish.
approvalProcess.submitTitle: Fɔ sɛn am fɔ mek dɛn gri fɔ am
approvalProcess.submitDesc: Di we aw dɛn kin gri fɔ mek dɛn gri:
approvalProcess.step1: Krio ɔ analayz wetin yu de tɔk bɔt
approvalProcess.step2: Klik ‘Submit for Approval’ fɔ sɛn am to yu manija
approvalProcess.step3: Trak aprɔval stetɔs na Pendin Aprɔval kiyu
approvalProcess.tip: Ad not dɛn we yu de sɛn kɔntinyu fɔ gi rivyu pipul dɛn kɔntɛks bɔt yu kriyaytiv disizhɔn dɛn.

aboutGuide.title: Bɔt & Bɛst Prɛktis dɛn
aboutGuide.description: Lan wetin Kɔntinɛnt de fɔ ɛn diskɔba di bɛst we fɔ mek yu kɔntinyu fɔ mek, brand dil, ɛn influensa profayl dɛn fayn fayn wan.
aboutGuide.feature2: Tips fɔ mek di tin dɛn we de insay de

sections.keyFeatures: Di men tin dɛn we yu fɔ du

whatIsContentry.intro: Kɔntinɛnt na wan AI-pawa kɔntinyu intɛlijɛns pletfɔm we dɛn mek fɔ ɛp kɔntinyu krieta, makɛt, ɛn ɛntapraiz fɔ mek, analayz, ɛn pablish kɔmpliant kɔntinyu na skel. If yu na wan wan influensa ɔ pat pan wan big makɛt tim, Kɔntinɛnt de strimlayn yu kɔntinyu wokflɔ.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Wi biliv fɔ gi pawa to di wan dɛn we de mek tin wit sɛnsful tul dɛn we de mek shɔ se ɛvri pat pan di tin dɛn we de insay de na di brand, we gɛt kɔlchɔ, ɛn we de fala di gaydlayn dɛn we de na di pletfɔm.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: AI-pawa kɔntinyu jɛnɛreshɔn we de mach yu brand vɔys
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Rial-taym kɔmplians chɛk fɔ di rigyuletɔri rikwaymɛnt dɛn
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Kɔlchɔral sɛnsitiviti analisis fɔ di glob ɔdiɛns
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Streamlined aprɔval wokflɔ fɔ ɛntapraiz tim dɛn
whatIsContentry.tip: Kɔntinɛnt de jɔyn di pawa we AI gɛt wit mɔtalman ovasayt fɔ gi kɔntinyu we de mek yu ɔdiɛns we de mek yu fil fayn ɛn we yu de fala di lɔ.

keyFeatures.intro: Kɔntinɛnt de gi wan kɔmprɛhnsiv suit fɔ tul fɔ manej yu ɔl kɔntinyu layfsaykl:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Jɛnɛret ay kwaliti kɔntinyu we dɛn mek fɔ yu brand ɛn ɔdiɛns:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Mɔlti-pletfɔm kɔntinyu jɛnɛreshɔn (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Di raytin tɔyn dɛn we yu kin kɔstɔmayz (Prɔfɛshɔnal, Keshual, Inspɛkshɔn)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: AI imej jenereshɔn fɔ akɔmpan yu post dɛn
keyFeatures.complianceTitle: Kɔmplians & Analysis we dɛn de du
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Mek shɔ se yu kɔntinyu mit ɔl di tin dɛn we yu nid bifo yu pablish:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Ɔtomatik kɔmplians chɛk agens di kɔmni polisi dɛn
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Kɔlchɔral sɛnsitiviti skɔring fɔ intanashɔnal ɔdiɛns
keyFeatures.tip: Yuz Stratejik Profayl fɔ mek shɔ se kɔnsistɛns brand vɔys akɔdin to ɔl di kɔntinyu we dɛn dɔn jenarayz.

bestPractices.intro: If yu fala dɛn bɛst we ya, dat go ɛp yu fɔ gɛt di bɛst pan di Kɔntinɛnt ɛn mek kɔntinyu we go wok fayn:
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Wan kɔnsistɛns wokflɔ de mek shɔ se kwaliti ɛn efyushɔn:
bestPractices.workflow1: Start bay we yu sɛt yu Stratejik Profayl wit brand gaydlayn
bestPractices.workflow2: Jɛnɛret kɔntinyu wit patikyula pletfɔm ɛn ɔdiɛns na maynd
bestPractices.workflow3: Ɔltɛm analayz di tin dɛn we de insay bifo yu pablish to ɛksternal pletfɔm dɛn
bestPractices.workflow4: Yuz scheduling features fɔ mek yu kɔntinyu fɔ post kadɛns kɔnsistɛns
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Kɔnsistɛns branding de bil trɔst ɛn rɛkɔgnishɔn:
bestPractices.consistency1: Uplod yu brand stayl gayd to di Knowledge Base
bestPractices.consistency2: Yuz di sem Stratejik Profayl fɔ kampen dɛn we gɛt fɔ du wit am
bestPractices.consistency3: Rivyu di tin dɛn we AI dɔn mek fɔ mek shɔ se i mach yu vɔys
bestPractices.warning: Ɔltɛm rivyu di tin dɛn we AI dɔn mek bifo yu pablish. Pan ɔl we wi AI pawaful, di we aw mɔtalman de wach wi de mek shɔ se wi gɛt di bɛst rizɔlt.

optimizeContent.intro: Fɔ mek fayn fayn tin dɛn na jɔs di biginin. Na dis na aw fɔ optimize fɔ maksimal ɛnjɔymɛnt:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Ɛni pletfɔm gɛt difrɛn tin dɛn we dɛn nid ɛn wetin di ɔdiɛns de op fɔ:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Fokus pan profeshɔnal insayt, yuz industri ki wɔd, lɔng fɔm akseptabl
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Kɔnsis mɛsej, yuz hashtag stratejik wan, ɛnjɔy wit tɔpik dɛn we de tren
optimizeContent.platform3: Fɛsbuk: Visual kɔntinyu de du fayn, ɛnkɔrej kɔmyuniti ɛnjɔymɛnt
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Ay-kwaliti vijual impɔtant, yuz rilevɛns hashtag, Stori fɔ ɛnjɔymɛnt
optimizeContent.engagementTitle: Boost Engagement fɔ di wok we yu de du
optimizeContent.engagement1: Post ɔltɛm na di bɛst tɛm fɔ yu ɔdiɛns
optimizeContent.engagement2: Yuz kɔmplit kɔl fɔ akshɔn insay yu kɔntinyu
optimizeContent.engagement3: Ansa to kɔmɛnt ɛn ɛnjɔy wit yu kɔmyuniti
optimizeContent.engagement4: Trak analitiks fɔ ɔndastand wetin kɔntinyu fɔ du di bɛst
optimizeContent.tip: Yuz Contentry in scheduling feature fɔ post di bɛst tɛm we yu nɔ tray fɔ du am wit yu an.

brandDeals.intro: Brand patnaship kin bi wan impɔtant revenyu strim. Na dis na aw fɔ mek yu ebul fɔ du di wok fayn fayn wan:
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Yu fɔ rɛdi we chans dɛn kam:
brandDeals.prep1: Mentɛn wan pɔshɔnal, kɔnsistɛns kɔntinyu pɔtfɔlio
brandDeals.prep2: Trak ɛn sho yu ɛnjɔymɛnt mɛtrik
brandDeals.prep3: Bil wan midia kit wit yu dɛmografik ɛn rich
brandDeals.prep4: Yuz Kɔntinɛnt fɔ jenarayz sampul branded kɔntinyu kɔnsɛpt dɛn
brandDeals.pitchingTitle: Pitching to Brands fɔ di kɔmni
brandDeals.pitch1: Align yu pitch wit di brand in valyu ɛn target ɔdiɛns
brandDeals.pitch2: Gi patikyula kɔntinyu aydia pas fɔ gi jenɛrik prɔpɔzal
brandDeals.pitch3: Inklud kɔmplians analisis fɔ sho se yu kɔntinyu mit di gaydlayn dɛn
brandDeals.tip: Yuz Contentry in kɔmplians chɛk we yu de mek spɔnsɔ kɔntinyu fɔ mek shɔ se dɛn mit FTC ɛn pletfɔm disklɔshɔn rikwaymɛnt dɛn.

influencerProfiles.intro: Yu Stratejik Profayl na di fawndeshɔn fɔ yu kɔntinyu strateji. Na dis na aw fɔ mek i bɛtɛ:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Wan prɔfayl we dɛn dɔn kɔnfigyut fayn fayn wan de mek shɔ se kɔnsistɛns, on-brand kɔntinyu:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Difayn yu nich ɛn target ɔdiɛns klia wan
influencerProfiles.setup2: Sɛt di tɔyn ɛn stayl we yu lɛk fɔ rayt
influencerProfiles.setup3: Ad kɔlchɔ ɛn rijinal kɔnsidareshɔn fɔ yu ɔdiɛns
influencerProfiles.setup4: Uplod rɛfrɛns dɔkyumɛnt dɛn we de difayn yu brand vɔys
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Kɔntinyu fɔ mek yu prɔfayl bɛtɛ fɔ mek yu gɛt bɛtɛ rizɔlt:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Rivyu di tin dɛn we dɛn dɔn mek ɛn ajɔst di prɔfayl sɛtin dɛn as nid de
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Krio plɛnti prɔfayl fɔ difrɛn kampen ɔ ɔdiɛns
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Kip yu Knowledge Base ɔpdet wit di laytst brand gaydlayn dɛn
influencerProfiles.tip: Rivyu yu Stratejik Profayl ɛvri tri mɔnt fɔ mek shɔ se i de sho yu brand ɛn ɔdiɛns we de evolv.

workflowsGuide.title: Wokflɔ & Skɔring Gayd
workflowsGuide.description: Lan aw di skɔring sistɛm de wok ɛn ɔndastand ɛni wokflɔ stɛp frɔm kɔntinyu analisis to aprɔval.
workflowsGuide.feature1: Skɔring Sistɛm we dɛn dɔn Ɛksplen

sections.analyzeContent: Analayz di tin dɛn we de insay

scoring.intro: Di skɔring sistɛm na Kɔntinɛnt de gi transparent, penalty-based skɔring fɔ ɛp yu fɔ ɔndastand aw yu kɔntinyu de du. Ɔl di mak dɛn kin bigin frɔm 100 ɛn dɛn kin pul di poɛnt fɔ patikyula vayɔlɛshɔn ɔ ishu dɛn we dɛn fɛn.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Di ɔvala skɔ na weit kɔmbaynshɔn fɔ ɔl di analisis faktɔ dɛn, we de frɔm 0 to 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Eksɛlɛnt - Rɛdi fɔ pablish, kɔntinyu fɔ ɔptimayz bad bad wan
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Gud - Smɔl impɔtant tin dɛn we dɛn kin advays bifo dɛn pablish
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Nid fɔ Atɛnshɔn - Rivyu ɛn rivyuz nid
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Flagged - Impɔtant tin dɛn, nɔ pablish te dɛn sɔlv am
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Di ɔvala skɔ de yuz adaptiv weit bays pan risk lɛvɛl:
scoring.overallCalc4: Kritikal Risk (Kɔmplians ≤40): Ɔvala skɔ had-kap na 40 maksimɔm
scoring.componentsDesc: Dɛn kin kɔl yu ɔl di mak frɔm tri impɔtant tin dɛn we yu de yuz wan sistɛm we de bays pan penalty:
scoring.component1: Kɔmplians Skɔ: I de stat frɔm 100, i de pul poɛnt fɔ ɛni vayɔlɛshɔn we dɛn fɛn
scoring.component2: Kɔlchɔral Sɛnsitiviti Skɔ: Avrej pan Hofstede in 6 kɔlchɔral dimɛnshɔn dɛm
scoring.component3: Akkurayt Skɔ: I de stat frɔm 100, i de pul poɛnt fɔ ɛni nɔ kɔrɛkt ɔ ɛni isyu we dɛn fɛn
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Ɛvri post kin stat wit wan Kɔmplians Skɔ we na 100. Dɛn kin pul di poɛnt fɔ ɛni wan we dɛn nɔ du wetin di lɔ se:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Kritikal Vayɔlɛshɔn (-60 pts): NDA brech, kɔnfidɛns info disklɔshɔn → Ris fɔ tɛmnɛshɔn wantɛm wantɛm
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Siviɔs Vayɔlɛshɔn (-40 pts): Harassment, diskrimineshɔn, et tɔk → Ligal akshɔn risk
scoring.complianceSeverity3: High Violation (-25 pts): Mis advatayzmɛnt disklɔshɔn, polisi brech → Fayn/sɔspɛns risk
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Mɔdaret Vayɔlɛshɔn (-10 pts): Tɔn we nɔ fayn, smɔl gaydlayn dɛvyayshɔn → Trenin/wɔnin
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Example: Mising #ad (-25) + Tone ishu (-10) = Faynal skɔ na 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Bɔku bɔku vayɔlɛshɔn dɛn de stak - ɛni penalty de aplay kumulativ wan
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Di vayɔlɛshɔn dɛn we dɛn chɛk: Kɔnfidɛns info, Harassment, NDA brech, Mis disklɔshɔn, Polisi brech, Nɔ aprɔpriet tɔyn
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Kɔlchɔ skɔ na di avɛrej fɔ siks ɔfishal Hofstede kɔlchɔral dimɛnshɔn (0-100 ɛvri wan):
scoring.culturalDim1: Pawa Distɛns: Fɔmaliti, rɛspɛkt fɔ ɔtoriti vs. egalitarian, keshual tɔyn
scoring.culturalDim2: Individualism vs. Collectivism: ‘Mi/Mi’ fɔs vs. ‘Wi/Wi’ kɔmyuniti fɔs
scoring.culturalDim3: Masculinity vs. Feminiti: Kɔmpitishɔn/asɛtiv vs. kɔpɔraytiv/kɔnsɛns langwej
scoring.culturalDim4: Uncertainty Avoidance: Rul, sefty, klia emphasis vs. opin to ambiguity
scoring.culturalDim5: Lɔng-Tɛm Ɔriɛnteshɔn: Fyuchɔ riwɔd fɔs vs. shɔt tɛm gens
scoring.culturalDim6: Indulgence vs. Restraint: Optimistik/ɛnjɔymɛnt vs. rizɔv/kɔntrol langwej
scoring.culturalRisk: We Kɔlchɔral Skɔ drɔp dɔŋ 50, dɛn kin yuz ‘Reputation Risk’ weit fɔ protɛkt yu brand akɔdin to di glob ɔl ɔdiɛns
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Ɛvri post kin stat wit Akkuracy Score we na 100. Dɛn kin pul di poɛnt fɔ di kwɛstyɔn dɛn we dɛn fɛn:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Major Inaccuracy/Misinformation (-40 pts): Falz klem, mek data
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Nɔn-Kredibul Sɔs (-20 pts): Klɛm frɔm sɔs we nɔ rili biliv
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Unverifiable Claim (-10 pts): Stetmɛnt dɛn we dɛn nɔ go ebul fɔ chɛk di tru tin dɛn
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Example: Falz klem (-40) + Sos we nɔ verify (-20) = Faynal skɔ na 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Bɔku bɔku isyu dɛn de stak - ɛni penalty de aplay kumulativ wan
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Di kɔntinyu fɔ flag ɔtomɛtik wan bay di analisis rizɔlt:
scoring.flag1: Gud Kɔvarej (Grin): Skɔ dɛn we pas 80 - rɛdi fɔ pablish
scoring.flag2: Nid fɔ Atɛnshɔn (Yɔlɔ): Skɔ 60-79 - dɛn kin rɛkɔmɛnd fɔ mek smɔl impɔtant tin dɛn
scoring.flag3: Flagged for Review (Orange): Skɔ 40-59 - rivyu nid fɔ de bifo dɛn pablish
scoring.flag4: Kritikal Isyu (Rɛd): Skɔ dɛn we nɔ rich 40 - nɔ pablish te dɛn sɔlv am
scoring.disclosureDesc: Fɔ prɔmoshɔnal kɔntinyu, di sistɛm kin chɛk bak:
scoring.disclosure1: Na Promotional: I de no if di tin dɛn we de insay de advatayz ɔ spɔnj am
scoring.disclosure2: Has Disclosure: I de chɛk fɔ di rayt #ad, #sponsored, ɔ patnaship diskloshɔn
scoring.disclosure3: Rijinal Kɔmplians: Verifay FTC (US), EU, ɛn Nɔwe disklɔshɔn rikwaymɛn
scoring.disclosure4: If yu nɔ tɔk bɔt sɔntin, dat kin mek yu gɛt Ay Vayɔlɛshɔn (-25 poɛnt) pan Kɔmplians Skɔ
scoring.tip: Dɛn kin kɔl di skɔ dɛn bak ɛvri tɛm we dɛn analayz di tin dɛn we de insay. Yuz di Rirayt ficha fɔ mek di tin dɛn we nɔ gɛt bɔku mak bɛtɛ ɔtomɛtik wan we yu de kip yu mɛsej.

analyze.intro: Di Analyze Content wokflɔ de ɛp yu fɔ evalyu di kɔntinyu we de naw fɔ di kɔmplians, kɔlchɔ sɛnsitiviti, ɛn kwaliti bifo yu pablish.
analyze.stepsTitle: Aw fɔ Analayz Di Tin dɛn we De Insay
analyze.stepsDesc: Fɔ fala dɛn step ya fɔ analays wetin yu de tɔk bɔt:
analyze.step1: Navigate to Kɔntinɛnt Intɛlijɛns > Analayz Kɔntinɛnt tab
analyze.step2: Paste ɔ tayp yu kɔntinyu na di tɛks eria
analyze.step3: Pik wan Stratejik Profayl fɔ yuz yu brand gaydlayn dɛn
analyze.step4: If yu want fɔ chɛk ‘Generate accompanying image’ if yu want AI fɔ mek wan vijual
analyze.step5: Klik ‘Analyze’ fɔ rɔn di ful analisis
analyze.analysisTypesTitle: Di kayn Analysis we Dɛn Du
analyze.type1: Kɔmplians Chɛk: I de chɛk di tin dɛn we de insay di pletfɔm polisi ɛn rigyuleshɔn dɛn (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Kɔlchɔral Sɛnsitiviti: I de skan fɔ di tin dɛn we kin mek pɔsin vɛks ɔ we nɔ kin mek pɔsin fil fayn
analyze.type3: Akkuracy Verification: I de chɛk di klem ɛn di tru tin dɛn fɔ si if dɛn kɔrɛkt
analyze.type4: Brand Alignment: Kɔmpia kɔntinyu agens yu Stratejik Profayl gaydlayn dɛn
analyze.tip: Yuz di ‘Rayrayt’ bɔtin fɔ ɔtomɛtik impruv kɔntinyu we gɛt mak dɔŋ 70. Di AI go adrɛs di prɔblɛm dɛn we dɛn dɔn flag we i de kip yu mɛsej.

generate.intro: Di Jɛnɛret Kɔntinɛnt wokflɔ de yuz AI fɔ mek nyu kɔntinyu bays pan yu tɔpik, di tin dɛn we yu nid fɔ du na di pletfɔm, ɛn di gaydlayn dɛn fɔ di brand.
generate.step1: Navigate to Kɔntinɛnt Intɛlijɛns > Kɔntinɛnt Jɛnɛreshɔn tab
generate.step2: Ɛntay yu tɔpik ɔ diskrayb wetin yu want fɔ mek
generate.step3: Pik yu target pletfɔm(dɛn) ɛn di raytin tɔyn
generate.step4: Pik wan Stratejik Profayl fɔ mek di brand kɔnsistɛns
generate.optionsDesc: Kastamayz yu kɔntinyu we yu dɔn mek wit dɛn opshɔn ya:
generate.option1: Plɛtfɔm Sɛlɛkshɔn: Pik wan ɔ bɔku pletfɔm dɛn (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Rayt Tɔn: Pik frɔm Prɔfɛshɔnal, Keshual, Inspɛkshɔn, ɔ Infɔmativ
generate.option3: Kɔntinɛnt Lɛngth: Adjɔst di target lɔng fɔ yu kɔntinyu
generate.option4: Imej Jɛnɛreshɔn: Tɔgl fɔ mek wan imej we AI dɔn mek we de wit am
generate.tip: Di kɔntinyu we dɛn dɔn jenarayz kin analayz ɔtomɛtik wan afta dɛn dɔn mek am. Rivyu di mak dɛn ɛn yuz di fidbak bɔtin dɛn fɔ rijeneret if nid de.

schedulePrompt.intro: Schedule Prompt de alaw yu fɔ sɛt ap ɔtomatik kɔntinyu jɛnɛreshɔn we de rɔn pan spɛshal tɛm dɛn, we de kip yu kɔntinyu kalenda ful witout manual intavɛnshɔn.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Krio prɔmpt dɛn we de mek di tin dɛn we de insay de ɔtomɛtik wan:
schedulePrompt.step1: Krio yu kɔntinyu jenɛreshɔn prɔmpt wit tɔpik ɛn prɛferɛns
schedulePrompt.step2: Sɛt di frɛkuɛns fɔ di schedule (ɛvride, ɛvri wik, ɔ sɔm patikyula de dɛn) .
schedulePrompt.step3: Pik di tɛm we dɛn fɔ mek di tin dɛn we de insay
schedulePrompt.step4: Enable ‘Auto-analyze’ fɔ rɔn analisis pan kɔntinyu we dɛn dɔn jenarayz ɔtomɛtik wan
schedulePrompt.benefitsTitle: Di bɛnifit dɛn we pɔsin kin gɛt we i kam pan di tin dɛn we dɛn kin aks fɔ
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Mentɛn kɔnsistɛns postin witout ɛvride manual wok
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Jɛnɛret kɔntinyu insay di optimal kriyaytiv awa dɛn
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Bil wan kɔntinyu baklɔg fɔ rivyu ɛn aprɔval
schedulePrompt.tip: Scheduled prompts de jenarayz kɔntinyu to yu draft dɛn. Rivyu ɛn gri bifo yu pablish fɔ mek shɔ se yu gɛt kwaliti.

schedulePost.intro: Schedule Post de alaw yu fɔ kiyu apruv kɔntinyu fɔ ɔtomɛtik pɔblishing na di bɛst tɛm akɔdin to yu kɔnɛkt soshal midia pletfɔm dɛn.
schedulePost.step1: Frɔm ɛni kɔntinyu we yu de si, klik ‘Schedule’ instead of ‘Publish Now’.
schedulePost.step2: Pik di de ɛn tɛm we yu want fɔ pablish
schedulePost.step3: Pik us kɔnɛkt soshal pletfɔm dɛn fɔ pablish to
schedulePost.step4: Kɔnfɛm ɛn ad to yu kiyu we yu dɔn sɛtul
schedulePost.optionsTitle: Di Tin dɛn we Yu Go Du fɔ Skedul
schedulePost.option1: Speshal Tɛm: Pik di rayt de ɛn di tɛm we yu fɔ pablish
schedulePost.option2: Bɛst Taym: Lɛ AI tɔk bɔt di bɛst tɛm fɔ post bays pan ɛnjɔymɛnt data
schedulePost.option3: Multi-Platform: Schedul di sem kɔntinyu akɔdin to bɔku pletfɔm dɛn wan tɛm
schedulePost.warning: Di post dɛn we dɛn dɔn schedul nid fɔ gɛt at le wan kɔnɛkt soshal midia akɔn. Kɔnekt akɔn dɛn na Sɛtin dɛn > Sɔshial Profayl dɛn.

approval.intro: Di Aprɔval Wokflɔ de mek shɔ se di kɔntinyu kwaliti bay we i nid fɔ mek di manija rivyu bifo dɛn pablish am. Dis impɔtant mɔ fɔ di ɛntapraiz tim dɛn ɛn di industri dɛn we dɛn dɔn rigul.
approval.processDesc: Aw di kɔntinyu de muv tru di aprɔval wokflɔ:
approval.step1: Krieta de sɛn kɔntinyu bay we i klik ‘Sɔbmit fɔ Aprɔval’.
approval.step2: Di tin dɛn we de insay de apia na di manija in Aprɔval Kiu
approval.step3: Maneja de rivyu di tin dɛn we de insay, di mak dɛn, ɛn di rizɔlt dɛn fɔ di analisis
approval.step4: Maneja gri, aks fɔ chenj, ɔ nɔ gri wit di tin dɛn we de insay
approval.status1: Draft: Dɛn de wok pan di tin dɛn we de insay, dɛn nɔ dɔn sɛn am yet
approval.status2: Pending Approval: Dɛn dɔn sɛn am ɛn wet fɔ mek di manija rivyu am
approval.status3: Dɛn dɔn gri fɔ am: Dɛn dɔn rɛdi fɔ pablish ɔ fɔ mek di program
approval.status4: Nid Rivishɔn: Maneja bin aks fɔ chenj - chɛk fidbak ɛn sɛn bak
approval.tip: Ad not dɛn we yu de sɛn kɔntinyu fɔ gi rivyu pipul dɛn kɔntɛks bɔt yu kriyaytiv disizhɔn dɛn. Dis kin mek di aprɔval prɔses go kwik.

gdpr.cookieDescription: Wi de yuz kuki fɔ mek yu browz ɛkspiriɛns bɛtɛ, fɔ gi yu yon tin dɛn, ɛn fɔ analayz wi trafik. We yu klik "Accept All", yu gri fɔ mek wi yuz kuki dɛn. Yu kin kɔstɔmayz wetin yu lɛk ɔ nɔ gri fɔ yuz kuki dɛn we nɔ impɔtant.
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: I nid fɔ ɔthɛntishɔn, sikyɔriti, ɛn di bɛsis wok. Nɔ ebul fɔ disable am.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Ɛp wi fɔ ɔndastand aw visitɔ dɛn kin intarakt wit wi pletfɔm fɔ mek wi savis dɛn bɛtɛ.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Dɛn kin yuz am fɔ gi pɔsin in yon advatayzmɛnt ɛn fɔ no aw kampen de wok fayn.
